snippet: Two suspects tried to break into the Marin County Juvenile Hall with a sledgehammer early Friday in an attempt to free a teenager accused of stealing a celebrity chef’s Lamborghini, the authorities said.
abstract: Two suspects try to break into the Marin County Juvenile Hall with a sledgehammer in an attempt to free Max Wade, teenager who is accused of stealing a celebrity chef Guy Fieri’s Lamborghini.
lead_paragraph: Two suspects tried to break into the Marin County Juvenile Hall with a sledgehammer early Friday in an attempt to free a teenager accused of stealing a celebrity chef’s Lamborghini, the authorities said.

headline.main: California: Sledgehammer Used in Breakout Try
headline.print_headline: California: Sledgehammer Used In Breakout Try
